def process_list_block(docstring, starting_point, section_end, leading_spaces, marker): ending_point = docstring.find('\n\n', starting_point) block = docstring[starting_point:None if ending_point == -1 else ending_point - 1] docstring_slice = docstring[starting_point:section_end].replace(block, marker) docstring = docstring[:starting_point] + docstring_slice + docstring[section_end:] lines = block.split('\n') lines = [re.sub('^' + ' ' * leading_spaces, '', line) for line in lines] top_level_regex = r'^ - ([^\s\\\(]+):(.*)' top_level_replacement = r'
  • \1:\2
    • ' lines = [re.sub(top_level_regex, top_level_replacement, line) for line in lines] lines = [re.sub(r'^ - ', '', line) for line in lines] indent = 0 text_block = False for i in range(len(lines)): line = lines[i] spaces = re.search(r'\S', line) if spaces: if line[spaces.start()] == '-': indent = spaces.start() + 1 if text_block: text_block = False lines[i] = '\n' + line elif spaces.start() < indent: text_block = True indent = spaces.start() lines[i] = '\n' + line else: text_block = False indent = 0 block = '
      \n' + '\n'.join(lines) + '\n
    ' return docstring, block
